name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Backend Engineer with 8 years of extensive experience, I excel in building scalable and efficient backend systems using **Ruby**, **Ruby on Rails**, and **PostgreSQL**. My comprehensive skill set includes developing robust **RESTful APIs** and managing databases with **MySQL**. Proficient in version control using **Git**, I ensure seamless collaboration and code management.
My technical expertise extends to cloud services like **AWS** and **GCP**, alongside containerization technologies such as **Docker**. I bring hands-on experience with message brokers and background job frameworks such as **SideKiq**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Kafka** to enhance system performance and reliability.
With a strong foundation in microservices architecture and CI/CD automation, I have led the development of high-performance backend solutions that integrate seamlessly with modern technologies. My passion for continuous learning and improvement drives my ability to build secure applications compliant with industry standards.
